alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 8:24PM CST until March 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River from Lafayette to Mount Carmel. .Minor flooding is ongoing across central and southern Indiana due to 1.5 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding is expected to persist well into next week with additional rain expected Thursday night and again this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, MARCH 17... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. * WHEN...Until Friday, March 17. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, River cabins become isolated. Basement flooding begins in Hutsonville. Extensive agricultural flooding is in progress. Higher Illinois rural roads in eastern Clark and Crawford counties flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday, March 16 and continue falling to 13.7 feet Saturday, March 18. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
